title: Adidas sent me a USED pair!
text: I received my all black superstars (grey) today and they have been worn. It can be seen through the worn out soles, the scuffed leather, the hole inside the shoe, and rocks at the bottom of the shoe. What a shame I was looking forward to wearing my NEW all black superstars.

title: Glad I bought these shoes.
text: Nice looking and comfortable shoes. Bought mine online and received it promptly in secured box.

title: Amazing love superstars
text: Lovely colour they will go with anything, the material is really nice too. They fit well and very comfy.....also I love the personalized aspect of these trainers ..... I'm a very happy customer

title: The real label contradicts description on the website
text: Comfortable shoes, cannot deny it. However, they are marketed « leather upper » on the website. The real label on the real shoe contradicts the website, as upper is : « synthetic, rubber ». Basically, what I shopped for was not what I received.

title: Rubbish personalisation and rude staff!
text: The trainers themselves are lovely but do NOT waste your time personalising them with flags or names! Worn once and the left foot flag came off, wore for the second time and the T and the O fell off of the personalised name on the right foot! Save your money. Very difficult to get hold of the company... Don't bother with their "WhatsApp" contact, after 4 days of trying, finally got through with the live chat but wasn't overly helpful and the operator ended the chat when i said i was unhappy with a £10 refund!! Not happy. Have ALWAYS used Adidas for my husband and children... now, they've lost a customer

title: letters missing after few days
text: I bought this product with extra words on both shoes. After one week some of the letters are missing. I paid 10£ i know its not much but they gone and i had them on feet maybe four times

title: Classic design: stylish and comfortable
text: Great staple. Comfortable and stylish. Comes up quite wide so don’t be tempted to size up.
color: Cloud White / Core Black / Cloud White

title: Size matters*
text: *go 1/2 size down. Im a size 9.5 us but ordered a 9 us and still have plenty of toe room left. Glad i didnt followed the other guy that said go 1 size up because if i did ill probably regret it. Super comfortable + same look as a yeezy but 1/3 the price. Whats a better deal than that. Looking forward for my next pair! Release more colorways please!

title: Awesome
text: Everything is perfect except the lays is not got it always get loose

title: Quality well built trainers
text: These trainers are very comfortable to wear and made of quality material. It fits to size and complements my outfits well.

title: Best non-boost, chunky shoe from Adidas
text: Go a half size down. These are not rain proof but they dry easily without marks or stains. Choose a dark colorway if you want them to look slimmer than they are. They look similar to the Yeezy 500's or 700's but more streamlined, slim and less bulky. They're comfortable even without boost. They're a lot lighter than a lot of adidas sneakers. They're definitely lighter than stan smiths or other sneakers with boosts. These provide a lot of padding and support to ensure a slipper/sock-like feel. Buy these if you want an everyday sneaker.

title: Received as a birthday gift, as I can never find an all black decent women's stylish trainer, these fitted the bill perfectly in colour and design !
text:
Searched for ages for womens all black stylish body and sole trainer in various brands. I can never ever find an all black pair in womens that is an all rounder, so these mens Ozweego's trainers fitted the bill perfectly!!!  I would have given a full 5* rating if you made them in womens as well!!!...some of us women don't like to wear "girly looking trainers" which are annoyingly in abundance out there wherever you look! 
I am one of those women who likes to wear stylish trainers in an all black style and design too and I shouldn't have to be "forced" to go into the men's section to do that!!!  Up your game addidas design department; I am fed up of searching for too many years as you and other brands have been missing out on an important demographic here... Or do I have to keep beating down your door for you to hear me??!!

title: Good purchase
text: Very Comfortable, perfect for training , good quality

title: Great
text: My first pair of ozweegos very comfortable fits nicely, mostly it also looks fire!

title: Look good
text: Look good and look like they will be suitable winter wear. Comfy.  Fit but probably could have gone up another half a size to last a teen boy slightly longer.  Bought a 9.5  usually wears a 9.
color: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White

title: Not a good quality
text: I just wear it less than a roughly a month and from home to work is just few mins walk and I’m tattoo artist so almost sitting inside the shoe on the back heel area lining has very poor quality and it’s only one side it was a bit uncomfortable from beginning and that cause a problem , it was my first experience with adidas and I’m disappointed

title: Great quality -size runs small
text: The shoes are extremely comfortable, but had to reorder in a half size up.

title: Great looking comfortable shoe
text: Great looking shoe if you like the higher profile sole.  Initial reaction is that they will be more leisure wear than running due to weight, but very comfortable
color: Altered Blue / Cloud White / Wonder Steel

title: LIKE WEARING SLIPPERS
text: GREAT LOOKING COMFORTABLE SHOE IN A SUPERB COLOURWAY
color: Altered Blue / Altered Blue / Wonder Steel

title: A big step up in quality
text: I was immediately impressed by the quality of these trainers. Even the shape of the sole is improved from cheaper trainers

title: Comfortable, stylish, trainers.
text: Really good fit for wide feet. So comfortable and look so good

color: Cloud White / Core Black / Cloud White

text: the Stan Smith is perfect. It's a comfortable shoe but is also the best match with any outfit.

title: Too Big
text: I love the shoes it’s very comfortable. However, the size is bigger than I expected. I ordered 3.5 UK which is 5US but it’s bigger than I expected. I’m not sure if this shoes size is Unisex but I guess for women have to size down. I tried to use it once and I had to use thicker socks so my feet won’t slip. Better to just buy directly at the store.

title: Primegreen poor quality
text:
I recently order a pair and thought there was something wrong with them with how different they where to a pair ive had for three years. I was right the quality on these have dropped with the use of recycled materials, I've had a pair for 6 weeks and they look like they are in a worse condition than my old pair what at three years old.  Sole is worn away and can see where a hole is forming insole already has holes in it. Also when wearing they feel odd like there is no structure to the sole like im standing on a strip of plastic.

Please go back to making no recycled stan smiths or reduce the price to £20 as they aint worth the price tag. I called CS about this and they said they wont be making them with any other materials.

title: Great if you are vegan, but I want real leather
text: I love Stan Smiths let’s get that in there 1st off, these new ones are great with the same comfortable fit as before, my problem is that I wanted real leather and it seems all new Stan Smiths are made with well let’s say pleather, so they don’t age the same and once they start to age the upper wears differently to real leather, scuffs are more difficult to cover as the surface of the material becomes damaged, on top of this I find my feet don’t feel as fresh in them as my older real leather pair. Overall they are good trainers but I wish Adidas would make real leather ones again.

title: Looks good with any outfit
text: I wear these with my jeans, suit pants, smart casual, khakis, shorts and socks. The white with gold accent matches pretty much anything. I have received many compliments on them and people are even more impressed when I tell them they are made from recycled plastic. Is it true? Not sure, but I hope it is because that's what I have told everyone. The other good thing is they have the half-sizes. I made the mistake of buying a size 11 because a shoe salesman at Platypus told me Adidas don't make 10.5 anymore and they were always just a little bit too big and I felt like I was wearing clown shoes. The 10.5 is just right.

title: Very disappointing.
text:
After enjoying the original real leather and rubber sole Stan Smiths for many years I was instantly disappointed with the new vegan primegreen version. 
The sole feels thin underfoot and offers minimal cushioning from the surface your walking on, feeling any rough surface particularly at the front of the shoe. 
The vegan leather whilst being soft is also much thinner than before, structurally giving you much less support.
For this price point and style of shoe, I will be looking at other brands and real leather options in the future.

title: Really Disappointed
text: I have worn Stans for at least 4-5 years now and have usually been thoroughly impressed with the comfort and durability. Unfortunately I can not say the same now. It seems that the last 2 pairs I have bought have only lasted 6-8 weeks and as you can see in the photo the soles are already nearly through the material and the rest of the shoe also very worn look. really disappointed and will be not buying again until something improves.
color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Collegiate Navy
